Shines Host is a Web hosting company providing reliable, quality and affordable services

Our main objective is to provide the best web solution as:

• Web Hosting
• Resellers
• Dedicated Servers
• VPS
• Cloud Servers

March Special offering starting 01-03/2011 and ending 31-03/2011

To reduce your time we have setup a toll free number:+1 877 793 6660
Your feedback on our service delivery is crucial for our further service improvement therefore we appreciate your comments and suggestions on following feedback@shineshost.com. All E-mails are of course kept confidential

Resellers: MAR10RESELL - Buy any of our Reseller Packages and get a 75% discount the first month.

Hosting: MAR1020HOST - Buy any of our Webhosting services and get a 50% discount the first month.

Linux Vps: MAR1030VPS - Buy any of our Linux VPS Packages and get a 20% discount the first month.

• Don’t forget we do offer Dedicated Servers at affordable prices.

• We have just added Cloud Servers, go check it out!


We are now offering TrialPay: Get any of our Bronze, Silver, Gold Hosting. Bronze or Silver Reseller for free!

TrialPay is best known for its “Get It Free” payment model, in which consumers get an item for free from a participating merchant by completing an offer from a TrialPay advertiser.

All our services come with the following:
We Guarantee 99.9% uptime.

Our server runs on a 1GPS port to give fast website load.

All our services are managed and we offer 24/7/365 support.

We offer Live Support to offer that next level of support.

All Hosting and resellers come with cPanel 11. Most used professional Hosting Control panel.

Our Servers is Located in the United States in a reliable Tier 4 Data Cetner.

Prices below DO contain the 20% discount.
